Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Flutter Developer to join our development team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining cross-platform mobile applications using the Flutter framework.
	You will work closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and product managers to deliver high-quality, performant, and user-friendly mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Application Development:&nbsp;Design and build advanced mobile applications using Flutter and Dart for Android and iOS platforms.
	UI/UX Implementation:&nbsp;Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes and mockups into high-quality, responsive user interfaces.
	API Integration:&nbsp;Integrate RESTful APIs and third-party libraries to enhance app functionality and performance.
	Code Optimization:&nbsp;Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices. Optimize applications for speed and performance.
	Testing and Debugging:&nbsp;Conduct thorough unit and integration testing, troubleshoot and debug issues, and ensure application reliability and responsiveness.
	Version Control:&nbsp;Manage code versions using Git and collaborate through version control platforms like GitHub or GitLab.
	Collaboration and Communication:&nbsp;Work with cross-functional teams including backend developers, QA testers, and product owners to deliver high-quality features on schedule.
	App Deployment:&nbsp;Manage deployment and release cycles to Google Play Store and Apple App Store, including handling certificates and compliance requirements.
	Continuous Learning:&nbsp;Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in Flutter development, mobile technologies, and development tools.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application

Flutter Developer Job at Stella Maris High School




        
    

        
        Stella Maris School is full of happy and highly motivated children. We are committed to providing a warm, welcoming and nurturing atmosphere with a strong educational ethos and moral values.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Flutter Developer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Flutter Developer to join our development team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining cross-platform mobile applications using the Flutter framework.
	You will work closely with UI/UX designers, backend developers, and product managers to deliver high-quality, performant, and user-friendly mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Application Development: Design and build advanced mobile applications using Flutter and Dart for Android and iOS platforms.
	UI/UX Implementation: Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes and mockups into high-quality, responsive user interfaces.
	API Integration: Integrate RESTful APIs and third-party libraries to enhance app functionality and performance.
	Code Optimization: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices. Optimize applications for speed and performance.
	Testing and Debugging: Conduct thorough unit and integration testing, troubleshoot and debug issues, and ensure application reliability and responsiveness.
	Version Control: Manage code versions using Git and collaborate through version control platforms like GitHub or GitLab.
	Collaboration and Communication: Work with cross-functional teams including backend developers, QA testers, and product owners to deliver high-quality features on schedule.
	App Deployment: Manage deployment and release cycles to Google Play Store and Apple App Store, including handling certificates and compliance requirements.
	Continuous Learning: Stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in Flutter development, mobile technologies, and development tools.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications and experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr.assistantsms@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Role Overview


	The Junior Digital Marketer will be responsible for managing our digital platforms with a focus on content writing, social media management, and community engagement.
	The ideal candidate is creative, detail-oriented, and capable of translating brand goals into impactful online strategies that foster engagement and growth.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop engaging and well-structured content (captions, blog posts, social media updates, newsletters) that aligns with brand tone and objectives.
	Manage and grow company social media pages (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.), ensuring consistent brand presence.

	Track, analyze, and report performance metrics (reach, engagement, conversions) and recommend improvements.
	Support digital marketing campaigns, including paid advertising, influencer collaborations, and promotional activities.

	Work closely with the marketing team to execute strategies that drive visibility, engagement, and conversions.
	Stay up to date with best practices, emerging platforms, and trends in social media and digital marketing.

	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, English, or a related field (preferred).
	Proven experience in content writing, social media management, and community management.
	Completion of digital marketing courses or certifications (Google, Meta, HubSpot, etc.) is a strong advantage.
	Excellent communication, writing, and editing skills with a creative flair.
	Strong understanding of social media platforms, algorithms, and audience engagement strategies.

	Research industry trends and competitor activities to generate fresh content ideas.
	Work closely with the marketing team to execute strategies that drive visibility, engagement, and conversions.
	Stay up to date with best practices, emerging platforms, and trends in social media and digital marketing.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, English, or a related field (preferred).
	Proven experience in content writing, social media management, and community management.
	Completion of digital marketing courses or certifications (Google, Meta, HubSpot, etc.) is a strong advantage.
	Excellent communication, writing, and editing skills with a creative flair.
	Strong understanding of social media platforms, algorithms, and audience engagement strategies.

What We Offer


	Competitive salary of N200,000 - N300,000 per month.

	Exposure to diverse aspects of digital marketing with room for professional development.
	A chance to build a long-term career as part of an innovative and ambitious team.
